definitions.definition: A pagan ; someone who is neither Christian , Jewish , or Muslim (other Abrahamic or monotheistic religions may or may not be included)
An uncultured or uncivilized person, philistine .
Alternative letter-case form of Heathen ( an adherent of the Germanic neo-pagan faith of Heathenry ) .

main_definition: A pagan ; someone who is neither Christian , Jewish , or Muslim (other Abrahamic or monotheistic religions may or may not be included)
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) An uncultured or uncivilized person, philistine .
Alternative letter-case form of Heathen ( an adherent of the Germanic neo-pagan faith of Heathenry ) .
